name: Sonic Teaches Running Fast (Chapter 3)-The Revenge Of Sonic.EXE!
name_original: Sonic Teaches Running Fast (Chapter 3)-The Revenge Of Sonic.EXE!
description:
Sonic Teaches Running Fast (Chapter 3)-The Revenge Of Sonic.EXE! is a game developed by BA16. It came out on 02-11-2019.
You can play Sonic Teaches Running Fast (Chapter 3)-The Revenge Of Sonic.EXE! on PC, macOS, Linux and Android. The game is sold via itch.io.
